::DrillBit::

He had tunneled under the ocean floor, and had finaly arrived at Hell
Beasts base.
"Alliance bots, I'm Commander DrillBit of the Predacon Pack. We are
working together on this. My troops will arive shortly, with allies.
He then activates his gattaling gun and opens fire on the base.
